Interface WordReaderInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CsvWordReader, ObjectInputStreamWordReader
public interface WordReaderInterface
An interface for Word objects readers.
Author:
Medhy DOHOU, Jean-Camille LAPIERRE, Dorian MOUNIER, Cyril PIGEYRE, Gabriel SAPONARA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Word readWord()
    A method to read a word.
    java.util.List<Word> readWords()
    A method to read multiple words.

  • Method Details

    • readWord

      Word readWord() throws java.io.IOException
      A method to read a word.
      Returns:
      the Word object read.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - An error occurred while reading/trying to read the object.

    • readWords

      java.util.List<Word> readWords() throws java.io.IOException
      A method to read multiple words.
      Returns:
      the List of read Word objects.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - An error occurred while reading/trying to read the objects.
